Title: Reckless Kelly
Writer: Yahoo Serious (screenplay), David Roach (screenplay), Warwick Ross (screenplay), Lulu Pinkus (screenplay)
Actors: Yahoo Serious, Melora Hardin, Alexei Sayle, Hugo Weaving
Plot: "Reckless Kelly is the Australian Robin Hood". Kelly is a bank robber, a pop-culture hero and video shop owner. This modern story tells how he is furious when a Japanese company wants to buy his band's farm.
